```{r}
set.seed(12345)

inputdata <- read.csv("ds.csv")
#apply(inputdata,2,function(x) sum(is.na(x)))

#str(inputdata)

inputdf <- inputdata[c(3:8,11,13,16:17)]
head(inputdf)

```

```{r}
index <- sample(1:nrow(inputdf), round(0.2*nrow(inputdf)))
train <- inputdf[index,]
test <- inputdf[-index,]

lm.fit <- glm(loan_status~.,data=train)
summary(lm.fit)
pr.lm <- predict(lm.fit,test)
MSE.lm <- sum((pr.lm - test$loan_status) ^2/nrow(test))
```
